result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bobby R Lewis

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
1:38 p.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Lisa Vanden Branden for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement - defendant will plea to count 1 on 2015CM169 and count 1 on 2016CF5 amended to misdemeanor bail jumping and 2015CF109 will be dismissed and read-in.  State concurs.  Atty Privat concurs.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 as charged on 2015CM169 and count 1 as amended to Misdemeanor Bail Jumping on 2016CF5.  Court orders 2015CF109 be dismissed and read-in.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by ADA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Privat.  Statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

2015CM169

-60 days county jail, stayed and places the defendant on probation for 12 months.  If served, with huber and out of county travel and out of county service.

2016CF5 

-SWD, and places the defendant on probation for 12 months.

CONDITIONS (BOTH CASES):

-Court costs. 
-Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
-Defendant is to abide by all rules and recommendations of the supervising agent including any counseling and/or treatment as recommended.
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

Court adjourned at 1:46 p.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 12, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 6, 2016 at 10:00 am.

12:10 p.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Barb Privat present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - we have an agreement and requests another date.  Court sets for plea & sentencing on July 6, 2016 at 10:00 a.m.

Court adjourned at 12:10 p.m.

10:34 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Barb Privat present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - will be able to resolve.  Court sets for plea & sentencing on June 21, 2016 at 11:30 a.m. 

Court adjourned at 10:35 a.m.
Status hearing on June 7, 2016 at 10:30 am.

4:35 p.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Barb Privat present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - just got the discovery on the newer case.  Court sets for Status Hearing on June 7, 2016 at 10:30 a.m.

Court adjourned at 4:35 p.m.

ADDRESS INFO for Bobby R Lewis
Current: 3400 N. Gordon Place Apt #1, Milwaukee, WI 53233 United States  (Effective: 04-04-2016)
Prior: 301 N Wisconsin St, Berlin, WI 54923
Status hearing on May 3, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

9:09 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  2016CF5 - Atty Privat confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing.  Statement by Atty Privat - defendant will waive the preliminary hearing.  Defendant concurs.  

Court instructs the defendant regarding his right to a preliminary examination.  Defendant waives his right to a preliminary examination.  Court accepts the waiver of the prelim and binds the defendant over for trial.

State files an information with the court.  Attorney Privat and defendant acknowledge receipt of the information and waives any reading.  Atty Privat enters a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of the defendant.  Court will set all cases for Status Hearing on May 3, 2016 at 3:30 p.m.

Court adjourned at 9:12 a.m.
Status hearing at 04-04-2016 09:00 am

9:52 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Barb Privat present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by the Court - sets the 2016CF5 for Initial appearance on March 15, 2016 at 1:00 p.m.  Other cases for Status Hearing on April 4, 2016 at 9:00 a.m.  

Court adjourned at 9:53 a.m.
Status hearing at 02-29-2016 09:30 am

Court adjourned at 11:21 a.m.
